channel.title: Posts on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.title: iSEE workshop at Bioc2019!
item.description: The iSEE package will be presented as a workshop at the Bioconductor 2019 conference in New York City! What to expect Charlotte Soneson and I will be conducting a workshop that demonstrates the many features and usages of the iSEE package. With the help of the iSEE team, we have prepared a vignette demonstrating the integration of the package functionality into an example single-cell RNA-sequencing workflow. The workshop was designed to cater for the needs of users at all levels of familiarity with R and the Bioconductor projects.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
